name: ragflow (infiniflow)
description: [项目级] RAGFlow is a leading open-source Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) engine that fuses cutting-edge RAG with Agent capabilities to create a superior context layer for LLMs。来源: https://github.com/infiniflow/ragflow

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
RAGFlow is a leading open-source Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) engine that fuses cutting-edge RAG with Agent capabilities to create a superior context layer for LLMs

来源: https://github.com/infiniflow/ragflow
语言: Python
Stars: 73452
